thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: CHAISE FITZGERALD
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by CHAISE FITZGERALD

author: CHAISE FITZGERALD
title: CHAISE FITZGERALD
text: Amazing customer service from the get go. All email responses were fast and helpful. By phone Taylor walked me through my options with a ton of tolerance and expertise. It can get complicated and frustrating and ADS helped me circumnavigate all of that! My goggles and prescription inserts were immeasurably the best decision I have made for ski comfort in years. Park City, powder, snowing, sunshine and grey they were clear and perfect. Oh, and my order was fast.
